General.Name: IBU tec advanced materials AG
General.Description: IBU-tec advanced materials AG engages in the testing, development, and production of materials for chemical industry worldwide. The company offers materials development and analytics; trails and scale-up; tolling; and consulting, engineering, and process optimization services. It also provides contract manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1885 and is headquartered in Weimar, Germany.
